title: Solved Mysteries; or, Revelations of a City Detective
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: The task occupiedsome time, and while I was thus engaged my fugitive wasmaking a strange journey. His race did not end till he hadreached the Queen's Park, when, finding himself not pursued,he got into hiding among the whins above St Margaret's Loch. There he loitered till nightfall, when he made his way down toLeith Harbour.
